asypad.ui

Class AsyPadPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • asypad.ui.AsyPadPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class AsyPadPane
extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
    A special drawing pane that interacts with the user and can be integrated into other JavaFX applications.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Raymond Feng

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCommand(Command c)
      Adds a new command to the AsyPadPane.
      void addShape(Shape shape)
      Adds a new shape to this pane, checking whether a shape with the same name already exists.
      void addShapes(Shape... shapes)
      Adds new shapes to this pane, checking whether a shape with the same name as each of shapes already exists.
      void clear()
      Clears the AsyPadPane by deleting all shapes and resetting the Stroke Width to the default.
      Shape findShapeByName(java.lang.String name)
      Searches the current shapes in the AsyPadPane for a shape with the given name.
      java.util.ArrayList<Shape> getShapes()
      Returns the shapes in this pane.
      void loadApad(java.io.File apad)
      Loads an AsyPad file into the AsyPad.
      void redo()
      Redoes a command in the AsyPadPane.
      java.lang.String toApad()
      Converts the current state of the AsyPad into .apad code for file i/o.
      java.lang.String toAsymptote()
      Converts the current state of the AsyPad into Asymptote code.
      void undo()
      Undoes a command in the AsyPadPane.
      void update()
      Updates the AsyPadPane by deleting all shapes with remove == true (this should be called each time delete() is called on a shape), hiding all shapes with hidden == true and showing shapes with hidden == false (should be called after each setHidden() call), and refreshing all shapes.
      void updateTool(java.lang.String tool)
      Updates the label that shows the current tool.
      void updateToolDescription(java.lang.String description)
      Sets the description of the current tool.

        public java.util.ArrayList<Shape> getShapes()
        Returns the shapes in this pane.
        Returns:

      • addShape

        public void addShape(Shape shape)
        Adds a new shape to this pane, checking whether a shape with the same name already exists.
        Parameters:
        shape - shape to add

      • addShapes

        public void addShapes(Shape... shapes)
        Adds new shapes to this pane, checking whether a shape with the same name as each of shapes already exists.
        Parameters:
        shapes - shapes to add

      • findShapeByName

        public Shape findShapeByName(java.lang.String name)
        Searches the current shapes in the AsyPadPane for a shape with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - name of shape to search for
        Returns:
        the shape with the given name, or null if it is not found

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the AsyPadPane by deleting all shapes and resetting the Stroke Width to the default.

      • addCommand

        public void addCommand(Command c)
        Adds a new command to the AsyPadPane.
        Parameters:
        c - the new command

      • undo

        public void undo()
        Undoes a command in the AsyPadPane.

      • redo

        public void redo()
        Redoes a command in the AsyPadPane.

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the AsyPadPane by deleting all shapes with remove == true (this should be called each time delete() is called on a shape), hiding all shapes with hidden == true and showing shapes with hidden == false (should be called after each setHidden() call), and refreshing all shapes.

      • updateTool

        public void updateTool(java.lang.String tool)
        Updates the label that shows the current tool.
        Parameters:
        tool - new current tool

      • updateToolDescription

        public void updateToolDescription(java.lang.String description)
        Sets the description of the current tool.
        Parameters:
        description - description of tool.

      • loadApad

        public void loadApad(java.io.File apad)
        Loads an AsyPad file into the AsyPad.
        Parameters:
        apad - file to be loaded

      • toApad

        public java.lang.String toApad()
        Converts the current state of the AsyPad into .apad code for file i/o.
        Returns:
        .apad code for current state of AsyPad

      • toAsymptote

        public java.lang.String toAsymptote()
        Converts the current state of the AsyPad into Asymptote code.
        Returns:
        Asymptote code representing the current state
